title: Runner submits snapshots and final report Snapshot

view.title: Runner submits snapshots and final report
view.subtitle: Final report artifact submitted.

data.instruction: Using agents tools, create a biz representing The Referral Unlock Reward. Use name/slug derived from saga context.
data.expectedResult: Biz is created, owner is auto-added as member with owner role, and biz id is captured.

data.instruction: Simulate customer joining waitlist/queue or prepaying for limited batch capacity.
data.expectedResult: System records customer demand in queue/waitlist model and exposes deterministic status transitions.
